title: casual as ranked team (high bronze - low gold) looking for a few more members!
body:
we are a few mates that play just for fun.

like playing ranked teams so we can choose out team mates and hopefully all get along. 
We have Teamspeak too.
we have a few silver players, a bronze and a gold and its a really good time!
add: Big Bud

replies.body:
IGN: PROJECT WUKONG
Rank: Silver 2
GMT +10

Top Champs: Wukong, Maokai, Rumble, Shen (Willing to learn more if needed)
Support Champs: Thresh, Braum, Leona, Blitz

Hey mate - keen to play a few games in a relaxed (non-toxic) environment. 

Still learning, nearly 30 (29) and looking to rank shortly after. Would just much prefer to play with a team rather than random trolls. 

I usually play ADC or Support. Don't mind which - Fallowfield is my name, thanks!
Added you im twisted s I d I would like to join my main goal is to get better as a player and hace fun as I play to get better
